title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. 
The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons appear to be too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
a. The buttons should have an appropriate size.
b. When the dialog comes up, the first table entry should be selected. Only the valid move buttons should be enabled.
c. The preview should display the complete parameter name without being cut off.
d. The dialog should resize to fit the content instead of appearing huge.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Change a parameter name to something very long.
3. Observe that the preview is cut off.
